text: Trapt Live! is the first live album by American rock band Trapt, released on September 18, 2007 by Eleven Seven Music. The live album contains two new studio tracks, "Stay Alive" and "Everything to Lose", while the rest was recorded during live performances. "Stay Alive" was released as a single in 2007. ==Track listing== ==Other Media== "Stay Alive" and "Made of Glass" found on Trapt.com in acoustic versions as well as nine videos released in 5.1 surround sound and stereohttps://web.archive.org/web/20070929070609/http://www.trapt.com/. ==Band members== * Chris Brown – lead vocals, rhythm guitar on "Echo" * Simon Ormandy – lead guitar * Pete Charell – bass * Aaron 'Monty' Montgomery – drums ==References== Category:2007 live albums Category:Trapt albums Category:Eleven Seven Label Group live albums
title: Trapt Live!
